about_the_game:
Hulzuyot is a psychological horror game where you experience the perspective of a salary man who has a disease.



Hulzuyot
In Hulzuyot, you arrive home after a visit to the doctor who informs you about your illness. You are a salary man who will have to perform household chores while your illness bothers you during the tasks. You will witness everything happening around you without being able to do anything but observe. You can read, play, and engage in household chores, but always be cautious.

Gameplay
Hulzuyot is a first-person simulator with mechanics involving various household tasks.

You take between 35-45 minutes to complete.

Key Features:
  • Atmospheric environment and photorealistic graphics
  • Retro VHS aesthetics
  • Performing household chores

name: Hulzuyot: Horror Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 TI 2gb | AMD Radeon HD 7770 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB | AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: You are a salary man who will experience terrifying situations due to a special illness, all while carrying out household chores.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
